and I just feel like nothing I’ve done is very impressive and I had no space to sell myself sob
I’ve applied for this job and it’s genuinely my dream job but the application was super light as they clearly get a lot of applicants

Managed to clash my teeth together while I was brushing them before bed and I've actually chipped one
My big sister borrowed a playsuit off me like a year ago and has just returned it and I'm too fat for it now lol
Making pals on the train by helping some guys out on words with friends
"Wow Jamie aren't these vintage Art Deco rings super nice wow I'll just pin them on Pinterest for research" "I'm just into art jam"
Showing him pics of the ring like "it's nice but I prefer a smaller stone than that" "maybe a couple of flat lying stones than one big one"
Every time someone I know gets engaged I make a point of telling Jamie about it in the least subtle hint of all time.
Forgot to take a pic of me and Jam looking fancy last night but ofc there is a pic of us in bed watching Parks and Rec by 11pm.
@hannahjtw I got a big pack off Amazon from a brand called Lamora and they are super soft and dense, really recommend!
@ciaramccartney it’s happened with my friend Richard and I before, where he gets wine and I get beer hahahaha

Seth Rollins lost his Royal Rumble place and is now working in the restaurant me and Jamie are at for dinner.
watching girls type with acrylics on is truly amazing
keeps referring to women as ‘females’ which really grinds my gears
my seminar leader keeps referring to equality laws as “special treatment” and I’m not feeling it

I'm talking like 32DD, for the record. Which I was once. When I was 15 and had yet to feel the full force of puberty.
Primark soft undies and bralets are really cute but if ur anything over a small DD cup then good luck
Then when I sit down to write I remember about all the research and referencing hell
I always feel sooooo motivated and positive about my dissertation after a meeting with my supervisor because he's so nice
@smiffy1903 well, free pizza and career advice
one next week promises pizza and one at the end of feb promises wine so I’m there
Quitting my job before christmas is so good because now I’m signing up for educational events left right and centre
But I also stomped about Oslo last year with a pretty severe pixie cut in doc martens and no bra for the most part
and more often than not present in a v typically feminine way, I like makeup, I like girly clothes.
Like I’m super feminine in a lot of ways, especially just in a biological way; I’m small and I’m squishy and soft
